artist: Woodcutter: Artist unknown, German Chinese; Publisher: Giulio Aleni
description: LR side has image of the Virgin under a shelter holding Christ Child; line of figures weave throughout image; most figures bear gifts; mountainous background with western architecture; eight Chinese characters throughout image; star at URC
title: The Adoration of the Magi, plate from Giulio Aleni's "Tianzhu jiangsheng zhuxiang jingjie" (An Illustrated History of the Lord of Heaven Who Became Incarnate in the Flesh), Jinjiang Church, Fujian Province, China
